AOT_COMPILING_UNSUPPORTED_SDK_VERSION.message: Unsupported SDK version for using AOT compiling. Current SDK version is %s, but the lowest SDK version which support AOT compiling is %s.
solutions: Update SDK to the latest version by going to File > Settings > %s.

AOT_COMPILING_DEFECT_SDK_VERSION.message: Current version of SDK has a bug when using AOT compiling. The compiling will continue with AOT compiling function disabled. Current SDK version is %d, but the lowest fixed SDK version is %s.
solutions: Update SDK to the latest version by going to File > Settings > %s.

MAIN_OR_FIELD_FILE_OUT_OF_SCOPE.message: The path configured in field main or field types is out of scope of hsp module: %s.
solutions: Make sure the path configured in main is under the directory of hsp module at file: %s
Make sure the path configured in field is under the directory of hsp module at file: %s

MISMATCH_AOT_COMPILE_MODE.message: apPath was not configured to partial at file: %s
solutions: Configure aotCompileMode = "partial" or remove apPath field.

PARTIAL_EMPTY_PATH.message: ApPath was not configured at file: %s
solutions: Under AoT's partial mode, make sure apPath are correctly configured in build-profile.json5.

PARTIAL_INVALID_SUFFIX.message: The suffix of apPath at %s is invalid.
solutions: Make sure the suffix of apPath is ".ap".

PARTIAL_INVALID_PATH.message: The file corresponding to apPath at %s under AoT's partial mode was not found in %s.
solutions: Make sure the path configured in apPath is valid.

REMOTE_HSP_NOT_ALLOWED.message: currentBundleType is shared, but Package %s's bundleType is not shared.
solutions: Make sure Package %s's bundleType is shared if the currentBundleType is shared.

EMPTY_MIN_API_VERSION.message: The minAPIVersion was not configured. At file: %s
solutions: Configure minAPIVersion for %s.

HAR_UNSUPPORTED_API_VERSION.message: The compatibleSDKVersion %s cannot be smaller than %s declared in library %s.
solutions: Try update the compatibleSDKVersion of current project.
Update minAPIVersion of the library.
Remove the library having smaller minAPIVersion than project's compatibleSDKVersion.

DUPLICATE_OUTPUT_NAME.message: Failed to build the app due to duplicate customized output names: %s. At file: %s
solutions: Please check the customized output name in the module target configuration

NO_HAP_FOUND.message: No HAP found for the APP. At file: %s
solutions: Check the build-profile.json file or hvigorconfig.ts of the project root directory and make sure at least one target is set to specified product: %s in applyToProducts.

UNSUPPORTED_API_VERSION_TARGET_ES_VERSIO.message: Unsupported API version.TargetESVersion is supported after API 12. At file: %s
solutions: Check compileSdkVersion and compatibleSdkVersion in the project-level build-profile.json5 file,  and make sure it is greater than API11.

UNSUPPORTED_RUNTIME_OS.message: The runtimeOS that supports the insight intent project can only be HarmonyOS. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure the runtimeOS type of the project is HarmonyOS for insight intent project.

UNSUPPORTED_API_VERSION_INSIGHT_INTENT.message: Unsupported API version.Insight intent is supported after API 11. At file: %s
solutions: Check compileSdkVersion and compatibleSdkVersion in the project-level build-profile.json5 file, and make sure it is greater than API11.

UNSUPPORTED_SDK_VERSION_INSIGHT_INTENT.message: Unsupported SDK version.Insight intent is supported after API 11. At file: %s
solutions: Update SDK to the latest version by going to File > Settings > OpenHarmony SDK.

UNSUPPORTED_SDK_VERSION_ARK_DATA.message: The current SDK version does not support ArkData. At file: %s
solutions: Update SDK to the latest version by going to File > Settings > OpenHarmony SDK
Make sure Module-srcEntry exists.

UNSUPPORTED_SDK_VERSION_UI_SYNTAX.message: The current SDK version does not support uiSyntax. At file: %s
solutions: Update SDK to the latest version by going to File > Settings > OpenHarmony SDK

UNSUPPORTED_API_VERSION_DYNAMIC_IMPORT.message: Invalid configuration of runtimeOnly in %s %s. At file: %s
solutions: The field of runtimeOnly for dynamic import only supports the API version > 11 and stageMode project.

SOURCES_NOT_FOUND.message: Unable to find the file or directory for %s using the relative path %s. At file: %s
solutions: Verify the path under 'runtimeOnly' in the module.

DYNAMIC_IMPORT_EXTERNAL_MODULE_PROHIBITE.message: Invalid dynamic import configuration %s in current module %s. At file: %s
solutions: The relative path of the file which is not in the current module or other modules in the project cannot be configured for dynamic import.

SOURCES_SUFFIX_INCORRECT.message: Invalid file %s found in the module %s dynamic import files. At file: %s
solutions: The dynamic import file must end with ts or ets.

DYNAMIC_IMPORT_ACROSS_MODULE_PROHIBITED.message: Invalid dynamic import configuration %s in module '%s'. At file: %s
solutions: The sources configuration of runtimeOnly in module is not allowed to configure across modules when strictMode-noExternalImportByPath is set to true.

DYNAMIC_IMPORT_PATH_INVALID.message: Invalid dynamic import configurations in current module %s. At file: %s
solutions: All dynamic import files or relative paths configured for the %s must exist in the added dependencies in its %s.

SOURCE_ENTRY_INVALID_SYNTAX.message: Invalid configuration of '%s' field. At file: %s
solutions: Relative file path(like ./**) is required for srcEntry.

PAGE_JSON_FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Unable to find the '%s.json' file or invalid resource directory configuration. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the default resource directory '.src/main/resources' exists.
Check if the resource directory customization is configured for current target %s.

FORM_SRC_FIELD_MISSING.message: The required field form.src is missing. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure form.src is configured at the form config file.

FORM_SRC_INVALID.message: The value of form.src: %s,  is not under module %s. At file: %s
solutions: Modify form.src in the form config file to make sure it is under the module.

FORM_SRC_NOT_FOUND.message: Form referenced in the config %s was not found in the project or the libraries. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the entry.src is configured correctly.
Check whether the form configure in entry.src exist.

EMPTY_MAIN_ELEMENT.message: The 'mainElement' field was not found in the module.json5 file. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure 'mainElement field is configured for atomic service.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_INVALID_RUNTIME_OS.message: Atomic service development is not supported for OpenHarmony stage model. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure the runtime OS for atomic service is HarmonyOS.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_UNSUPPORTED_API.message: Atomic service development is not supported for compileSdkVersion/compatibleSdkVersion less than api 11. At file: %s
solutions: Verify the compileSdkVersion/compatibleSdkVersion and make sure it is at least api 11.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_UNSUPPORTED_NATIVE.message: Atomic service development does not support Native development. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure externalNativeOptions is not configured for atomic service.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_JS_WIDGET.message: Atomic service development only supported arkTS widget. At file: %s
solutions: Remove the js widget for atomic service.
Make sure the path provided is valid.

SOURCE_FILED_EMPTY.message: %s is a invalid path. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure the path configured in mock-config.json5 exists.

INTEGRATED_HSP_UNSUPPORTED_API.message: The integratedHsp can only be used in API 12 and later. At file: %s
solutions: Verify the compileSdkVersion/compatibleSdkVersion and make sure it is at least api 12.

INTEGRATED_HSP_REQUIRED_NORMALIZED_OHMUR.message: The integratedHsp is available only when useNormalizedOHMUrl is set to true. At file: %s
solutions: Check the buildOption and set useNormalizedOHMUrl to true.

CONFIG_FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Invalid configuration in the app.json5. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the path of configuration file exist and configure to a valid path.

FIELD_FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Invalid configuration. The path of %s does not exist. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the path of field exist and configure to a valid path.

SHORTCUTS_FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Invalid shortcuts path. Check the configuration '%s' in module '%s''s module.json5. The path of file '%s' is not valid.
solutions: Check whether the path of field exist and configure to a valid path.

BYTE_CODE_HAR_UNSUPPORTED.message: Only the byte code har supports to configure the bundledDependencies. At file: %s
solutions: The 'buildOption.strictMode' must have required property 'useNormalizedOHMUrl' and its value must be true in project-level
Check that build-profile.json5, and 'buildOption.arkOptions.byteCodeHar' cannot be false in module-level build-profile.json5.

JSON_PROFILE_MISSING.message: The device type defined for the module %s is empty and the %s file is not found because the %s file is not imported. At file: %s
solutions: Check the %s file of module %s or import the %s file.

SYSCAP_FIELD_NOT_EMPTY.message: The value of %s in the %s file must be the same as that of %s in the %s %s file. At file: %s
solutions: Please check whether the % field in the %s file and the %s field in the %s %s are the same.

DEVICE_TYPE_NOT_INCONSISTENT.message: Unable to find the %s field or its value is invalid. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure the %s field is contained in the %s file and its value must be the same as the value of %s in the %s's %s file

PAGE_SOURCE_FILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Unable to find the page source file %s in %s routerMap configuration. At file: %s
solutions: Check the routerMap configuration of the module %s.

PAGE_SOURCE_FILE_FORMAT_INVALID.message: Invalid pageSourceFile format in the %s routerMap configuration. At file: %s
solutions: PageSourceFile field in routerMap configuration must be defined as relative path starting with 'src/' format.

PKG_CONTEXT_INFO_PATH_NOT_AVAILABLE.message: The pkgContextInfoPath ${pkgContextInfoPath} is not available. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure pkgContextInfoPath is a valid path.

PKG_NAME_NOT_EXIST.message: The pkgName %s does not exist. At file: %s
solutions: PageSourceFile field in routerMap configuration must be defined as relative path starting with 'src/' format.

SRC_LANGUAGE_UNDEFINED.message: Module-Abilities-srcLanguage in %s is not defined. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure srcLanguage label exists.

SRC_PATH_NOT_FOUND.message: Module-Abilities-srcPath %s file %s not found. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure %s file exists.

MODULE_JS_PAGE_NOT_FOUND.message: Module-js-page %s file %s not found. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure %s file exists.

MODULE_PAGE_NOT_FOUND.message: Module page %s not found. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure /resources/base/profile/%s.json exists.

THE_TYPE_OF_TARGET_DEVICEC_DOES_NOT_MATC.message:
The type of target device does not match the device type configured by module: %s.
Required device type:%s, current module device type:%s
solutions: Make sure the deviceTypes field set in module.json5 under src/main of the module directory contains the required type.
Make sure the device types specified under target in the build-profile.json5 file of the module directory contain the required one.
Check whether the hvigorfile.ts or hvigorconfig.ts file contains any code that may change the module deviceTypes settings.

USENORMAILZEDOHMURL_CAN_ONLY_BE_USED_IN_.message:
UseNormalizedOHMUrl can be true only when Compatible SDK Version is 5.0.0 (12) or later. 
	at %s.
solutions: If Compatible SDK Version is 4.1.0(11) or earlier, set useNormalizedOHMUrl to false.

THE_LOCAL_DEPENDENCY_BELOW_IN_MODULE_%S_.message:
The local dependency below in module %s is invalid. It may cause an ohpm install error when being integrated.
%s
solutions: Make sure the local dependencies specified under dependencies and dynamicDependencies in the oh-package.json5 file of the module are all in the current module directory.
Troubleshoot the errors according to the following guidelines.

THERE_ARE_SOME_DEPENDENCY_NAMES_THAT_ARE.message: There are some dependency names that are inconsistent with the actual package names.
solutions: Local dependency "%s" found in "%s" does not match the actual name "%s" of its oh-package.json5, change it to "%s".

UNABLE_TO_GET_VERSION_AND_NAME_IN_OH_PAC.message: Unable to get dependency '%s''s version and name at file: %s
solutions: Check if the usage of corresponding parameterFile.json5 is supported at %s.

Check if this module relies on the .so files inside the module itself using parameterization configuration, which is not supported. Try to use relative path instead of parameterization to set the .so dependency.

LOCAL_DEPENDENCY_IN_PARAMETER_FILE_DOES_.message: Local dependency in parameterFile does not exist.
solutions: File path: "%s" configured in "%s" does not exist, the parameterKey is "%s".
Check if the local dependency path exists.
Check if the local dependency path is case-sensitive.
File path: "%s" configured in "%s" is unrecognized archive format, the parameterKey is "%s".

INVALID_VALUE_OF_%S_IN_THESYSTEM_ENVIRON.message: Invalid value of '%s' in the system environment path.
solutions: Correct the value, run hvigorw --stop-daemon to stop the daemon process, and then try again.

USENORMAILZEDOHMURL_DO_NOT_MATCH.message: The useNormalizedOHMUrl settings of packages [%s] and the project useNormalizedOHMUrl:%s do not match.
solutions: Use the packages that match the project settings. If useNormalizedOHMUrl is not set, the default value false is used.

THE_REASON_AND_USESCENE_ATTRIBUTES_ARE_M.message:
The reason and usedScene attributes are mandatory for user_grant permissions. 
 at %s
solutions: For the hap module, add the reason and usedScene fields to the permission reported in the preceding file.
For the har/hsp module, add the reason field to the permission of the error information in the preceding file.
Perhaps you can check the parameter configuration of arguments in module level build-profile.json5

Change the 'routerMap' object names listed below under routerMap in the respective router configuration files. Make sure the names are unique across the current module and the modules on which it depends.
  %s

FAILED_TO_OBTAIL_THE_MODULE_TYPE.message: Failed to obtain the module type.
solutions:
Make sure the module is in the FA model and the module/distro/moduleType field in the config.json file is correctly configured.
at %s

THE_%S_PERMISSION_UNDER_REQUESTPERMISSIO.message:
The %s permission under requestPermissions must be a value that is predefined within the SDK or a custom one that you have included under definePermissions.
at %s
solutions: Modify the permission configuration in the preceding file.

THE_REASON_ATTRIBUTE_ARE_MANDATORY_FOR_U.message:
The reason attribute are mandatory for user_grant permissions. 
 at %s
solutions: For the hap module, add the reason and usedScene fields to the permission reported in the preceding file.
For the har/hsp module, add the reason field to the permission of the error information in the preceding file.

THE_METADATE_FIELD_IN_FORMEXTENSIONABILI.message: The metadata field in FormExtensionAbility cannot be left blank or as an empty array. At file: %s
solutions: Please check the metadata field in FormExtensionAbility at file: %s

IN_FORMEXTENSIONABILITY_METADATA_MUST_CO.message: In FormExtensionAbility, metadata must contain an object with its name set to 'ohos.extension.form' and resource set to a second-level resource reference. At file: %s
solutions: Please check the metadata field in FormExtensionAbility at file: %s

BYTECODE_HARS_%S_NOT_SUPPORTED_WHEN_USEN.message: Bytecode HARs: [%s] not supported when useNormalizedOHMUrl is not true.
solutions: Please check useNormalizedOHMUrl in the project-level build-profile.json5 file.

Change the 'Module-Abilities' object names listed below under abilities in the respective module.json5. Make sure the names are unique across the current module and the modules on which it depends.
  %s
Make sure the name has been configured in the form_config.json file.

FOUND_HSPS_THAT_HAVE_THE_SAME_HAR_DEPEND.message:
Found HSPs that have the same HAR %s
%s
solutions: Follow the best practice at moreInfo.

WRONG_STRING_JSON_FORMAT.message: File 'string.json' is missing the required property 'string'.

AUTO_LAZY_IMPORT_CANNOT_BE_CONFIGURED_FO.message: autoLazyImport cannot be configured for the current API version. autoLazyImport can be used in the beta3 version of API 12 or higher versions.
solutions: Check the compatibleSdkVersion and compatibleSdkVersionStage in project's build-profile.json5
If the compatibleSdkVersion is set to API 12, configure the compatibleSdkVersionStage needs to beta3, or
Set autoLazyImport to false to disable it.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_INVALID_ABILITY_LENGTH.message: Atomic service: Invalid length of module.abilities at %s
solutions: For entry module, make sure only one ability is configured. Remove redundant abilities or add abilities to keep only one ability in module.abilities.
For non-entry module, make sure abilities is empty or the length of abilities is 0.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_INVALID_ABILITY_VALUE.message: Atomic service: Invalid value of %s at %s
solutions: Make sure the value of module.abilities.name is equal to the value of module.mainElement.
Make sure abilities.launchType is set to Singleton.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_INVALID_SKILL_LENGTH.message: Atomic service: Invalid length of module.abilities.skills at %s
solutions: Make sure only one module.abilities.skills is configured.
Remove redundant skills or add skills to keep only one skill in module.abilities.skills.

ATOMIC_SERVICE_INVALID_SKILL_VALUE.message: Atomic service: Invalid value of %s at %s
solutions: Make sure only entities and actions are configured in module.abilities.skills.entities.
Make sure module.abilities.skills.entities is set to [entity.system.home].
Make sure module.abilities.skills.actions is set to [action.system.home].

THE_MATERIAL_HAS_NOT_BEEN_CONFIGURED_IN_.message: The material has not been configured in signingConfigs. At file: %s
solutions: Please check signingConfigs in root project file

INVALID_%S_VALUE_MAKE_SURE_IT_IS_NOT_NUL.message: Invalid %s value. Make sure it is not null or empty. The file must be included in '%s'. At file: %s
solutions: Please check signingConfigs in root project file

SIGNING_CONFIGURATION_%S_DOES_NOT_APP_TO.message: Signing configuration %s does not apply to %s. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure that the type field in the signature configuration is consistent with the runtimeOS field

THE_%S_PLUGIN_WAS_NOT_FOUND_WHEN_INITIAL.message: The %s plugin was not found when initializing the %s module.
solutions: Check if the module.type field in the module.json5 file matches the system plugin exported in the hvigorfile.ts file.

THE_%S_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST.message: The %s file does not exist. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure the %s file exist.

THE_MAIN_FIELD_SET_IN_PACKAGE_JSON_CORRS.message: The main field set in oh-package.json corresponding path %s in Har is invalid. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure the file exist.

UNABLE_TO_REPLACE_PAGES_CANNOT_FIND_PAGE.message: Unable to replace pages. Cannot find moduleJsonObj.module.pages in module %s.
solutions: Check the router configuration.
Check whether the syntax of the service code is correct based on the error information.

BUILDPROFILEFIELDS_ONLY_SUPPORT_NUMBER_S.message: buildProfileFields only support number/string/boolean,not support %s, the value %s does not meet the requirements. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure that the value type in buildProfileFields is correct.

BYTECODEHAR_NOT_SUPPORTED_WHEN_BLOW_API_.message: byteCodeHar not supported when below API version 12.
solutions: Please check compileSdkVersion and compatibleSdkVersion in the project-level build-profile.json5 file.

BYTECODEHAR_NOT_SUPPORTED_WHEN_USENORMAL.message: byteCodeHar not supported when useNormalizedOHMUrl is not true.
solutions: Please check useNormalizedOHMUrl in the project-level build-profile.json5 file.

THE_PROPERTY_OF_HEADERPATH_SPECIFIES_DIR.message: The property of headerPath specifies directory %s which doesn't exist. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure the file exist.

THE_PROPERTY_OF_HEADERPATH_SPECIFIES_DIR.message: The property of headerPath specifies directory %s is not directory. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure that %s is a directory

THE_FOLLOWING_PATH_CONTAINS_A_FILE_WITH_.message: The following path contains a file with the same name: %s. At file: %s and %s
solutions: Ensure that no file with the same name exists in headerPath.

THE_CONFIGURED_CMAKE_SCRIPT_IN_EXTERNALN.message: The configured cmake script in externalNativeOptions/path cannot be empty. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure the configured cmake script in externalNativeOptions/path is a valid value

THE_CONFIGURED_CMAKE_SCRIPT_IN_EXTERNALN.message: The configured cmake script in externalNativeOptions/path does not exist. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure the configured cmake script in externalNativeOptions/path is a valid value

THE_CONFIGURED_CMAKE_SCRIPT_NAME_%S_SHOU.message: Error cmake script name %s, should be CMakeLists.txt. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure the configured cmake script in externalNativeOptions/path is a valid value

ARMEABIV7A_NOT_SUPPORTED_FORHARMONYOS.message: "armeabi-v7a" not supported for HarmonyOS. At file: %s
solutions: Please specify a valid arch in abiFilters.

ARMEABIV7A_NOT_SUPPORTED_OPENHARMONY_AS_.message: "armeabi-v7a" not supported for OpenHarmony as the only option. At file: %s
solutions: Please add "arm64-v8a" or "x86_64" to abiFilters.

INVALID_DATA.message: The length of the storePassword or keyPassword field in the signature configuration is less than 32. At file: %s
solutions: Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material

INVALID_PASSWORD_LENGTH.message: The length of the storePassword or keyPassword field in the signature configuration is an even number. At file: %s
solutions: Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material

SIGNING_FAILED_NO_SIGNING_NATERIALS_IS_N.message: Signing failed: Signing materials %s is not a directory. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure signing materials %s is a directory
Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

SIGNING_FAILED_NO_SIGNING_NATERIALS_IS_A.message: Signing failed: Signing materials %s is an empty directory. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure signing materials %s is not an empty directory
Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

SIGNING_FAILED_CAN_NOT_FIND_SIGNING_MATE.message: Signing failed: Can not find signing material %s. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure signing materials %s is exist in %s
Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

SIGNING_FAILED_SIGZNING_MATERIAL_DATA_ER.message: Signing failed: Signing material data error!. At file: %s
solutions: Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

SIGNING_FAILED_SIGNING_MATERIAL_IS_ILLEG.message: Signing failed: Signing materials %s is illegal!. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure signing materials %s is correct
Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

SIGNING_FAILED_CAN_NOT_FIND_THE_SIGZNING.message: Signing failed: signing material %s is empty or not a directory. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure signing materials %s is a directory
Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

SIGNING_FAILED_SIGZNING_MATERIAL_ERROR.message: Signing failed: Signing material error. At file: %s
solutions: Ensure signing materials %s is correct
Re-execute sign your appp/atomic service automatically：clear the signingConfigs field in the %s file  and go to Project Structure > Project > Signing Configs and apply the signature material
Reconfigure the signature or clear the %s folder and perform signing again.

DUPLICATED_FILES_DOUND_IN_LIBPATH.message:
Duplicated files found in module %s. This may cause unexpected errors at runtime. 
 %s
solutions: Set .so file priorities with pickFirsts, pickLasts, or select option.
Make sure each .so file name is unique.

Change the value ('%s') of '%s' at '%s'. Make sure it starts with a letter or digit, contains a maximum of 60 characters consisting of only letters, digits, periods (.), hyphens (-), and underscores (_), and is not 'latest.'

THE_TAG_KEYWORD_IS_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_VERSI.message: The 'tag' keyword is not allowed for 'version' at '%s'.
solutions: Change '%s' to a non-tag value for '%s' at '%s'.
Make sure the module is in the stage model and the module.json5 file exists. At file: %s

PROFILE_NOT_FOUND.message: Profile '%s' not found or invalid resource directory configuration.
solutions: Check whether the default resource directory '.src/main/resources' exists.
Check whether the resource directory customization is correctly configured for current target '%s'.
Check whether the profile '%s' exist in the configured resource directory.

APPJSON5_NOT_FOUND.message: app.json5 file not found. At file: %s
solutions: Make sure the app.json5 file exists.

A_UNKNOWN_TYPE_NAME_ERROR_HAS_OCCURRED.message: A 'unknown type name' error has occurred.
solutions: Troubleshoot the errors according to the following guidelines.

OH_PACKAGE_NAME_NOT_STRING.message: Error in %s. The name of the module must be a string, but received a %s.
solutions: Verify the 'name' in oh-package.json5 files.

OH_PACKAGE_VERSION_NOT_STRING.message: Error in %s. The version number of the module must be a string, but received a %s.
solutions: Verify the 'version' in oh-package.json5 files.

THIS_PROJECT_IS_IN_THE_FA_MODEL_AND_DOES.message: This project is in the FA model and does not allow for external dependencies.
solutions: Remove external dependencies
Use a project in the stage project.

THIS_PROJECT_IS_IN_THE_STAGE_MODEL_AND_D.message: This project is in the stage model and does not allow for dependencies of modules in the FA model.
solutions: Use dependencies of modules in the stage model instead

CANNOT_DEPEND_ON_HAP_MODULES_OUTSIDE_OF_.message: Cannot depend on HAP modules outside of this project
solutions: Use dependencies of HSP or HAR modules instead.
Check whether the file exists.
Check whether the current user has the permission to delete the file.
Check whether the file is occupied by other processes.
You can also manually delete the file.

FILE_PATH_EXCEED_LIMITATION.message: The length of path exceeds the maximum length: %s.
solutions: Make your project root path shorter.
Simplify your project name.
Simplify your module name.
Configure a shorter target name.

PARAMETER_FILE_KEY_ERROR.message: Failed to parse '%s'. Check whether the '%s' file and its content exist.
solutions: Ensure that parameterFile is correctly configured in project-level oh-package.json5 file.
Ensure that the configuration item exists in the parameterFile configuration and the case is the same.

SDK_VERSION_UNDER_API8.message: Only SDKs of API level 8 and later versions can be compiled(current API version is %d). Check the compatibleSdkVersion configuration at file: %s
solutions: Select API level 8 or a later SDK version to create a project.

SDKVERSION_ORDER_ERROR.message: In the project-level configuration file build-profile.json5, the version relationship between compileSdkVersion, compatibleSdkVersion and targetSdkVersion is incorrect. At file: %s
solutions: Configure the API version according to the rule of compatibleSdkVersion <= targetSdkVersion <= compileSdkVersion.

SDKVERSION_FORMAT_ERROR.message: In the current configuration mode, api of $s must be a %s. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the data type and version number of the compatibleSdkVersion field in the project-level build-profile.json5 file match.

SDKMANAGER_NOT_SUPPORT_THIS_API.message: Unable to find the %s %s(%s) in SDK Manager. At file: %s
solutions: Since NEXT Developer Beta1, DevEco Studio offers an out-of-the-box development experience by packaging the SDK, Node.js, Hvigor, ohpm, and other toolchains together, simplifying the installation and configuration process of DevEco Studio. It also provides integrated capabilities for migrating historical projects, helping you quickly complete project conversion.
To download the integrated IDE, visit https://developer.huawei.com/consumer/cn/download/

SDKMANAGER_APIVERSION_AND_PLATFORM_NOT_M.message: The platform version '%s' and API version '%s' of %s in build-profile.json5 do not match. At file: %s
solutions: Configure related versions based on the DevEco Studio compatibility mapping (for example, https://developer.huawei.com/consumer/cn/doc/harmonyos-releases/deveco-studio-new-features).

FILE_NOT_FOUNF_OR_UNEXCUTABLE.message: Not an internal or external command, operable program, or batch file. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the file '%s' exists.
Check whether the file '%s' is executable.

ALLOW_ONE_HSP.message: Remote tgz is error, only one hsp is allowed, please check %s.
solutions: Ensure that the number of HSP modules in %s is less than or equal to 1.

VERSION_ILLEGAL.message: The format of the version field in %s is invalid. Check whether the format complies with the SemVer specifications.
solutions: Modify the version field according to the SemVer specifications.

NO_PACKAGE_FOUND.message: The oh-package.json5 file cannot be found in the remote HSP '%s'. Check whether the oh-package.json5 file exists in %s.
solutions: Check whether the oh-package.json5 file exists in the HSP package in %s. If the oh-package.json5 file does not exist, the package is damaged. Download the package again or contact the author.

NO_HSP_FOUND.message: Cannot find the .hsp file in the remote HSP. Check whether the .hsp file exists in the %s directory.
solutions: Check whether the HSP package in %s contains .hsp files. If no .hsp file exists, the package is damaged. Download the package again or contact the author.

BUNDLETYPE_NOT_MATCH.message: When 'bundleType' in app.json is set to '%s', the module type must also be '%s'. The module that reports the error is '%s', %s.
solutions: Set the type in module.json5 of the %s module to '%s'.
Set 'bundleType' in app.json to a non-shared or non-appPlugin type.

OBFUSCATION_FILE_LOST.message: The obfuscation rule file '%s' cannot be found in %s. The error module is %s, %s.
solutions: Ensure that the %s obfuscation rule file exists in %s.
Ensure that the rule file configured in the 'files' field under 'ruleOptions' in the module-level build-profile.json5 file exists.

HAR_TARGET_NOT_MATCH.message: Unable to find target '%s' in build-profile.json5 of module '%s'.
solutions: Ensure that the module '%s' has the same target as module '%s'.

HSP_TARGET_NOT_MATCH.message: Unable to find target '%s' in build-profile.json5 of module '%s'. %s
solutions: Ensure that the module '%s' has the same target as module '%s'.
Ensure that the module '%s' exists.
Verify the Internet connection.
Verify the repository address, package name, and version number.

CANNOT_CONFIGURE_MODULE_WHEN_PACKING.message: Cannot run '-p' to configure entry/hsp module in the command line when packaging App, at: %s.
solutions: Wait for the app packaging to complete or manually stop the packaging process before configuring the entry/hsp module.
Check the ability name in the config.json file and make sure it is unique.
Check the form name in the config.json file and make sure it is unique.

FA_MODE_NOT_SUPPORT_MODIFY_FILE.message: FA mode does not support modifying the %s.
solutions: Ensure that the FA model configuration file is correct.

IS_NOT_RELATIVE_PATH.message: The path is not relative path at file: %s
solutions: Only relative path is allowed.

PLUGIN_PATH_NOT_FOUND.message: Plugin path not exists at file: %s
solutions: Check if the path is configured incorrectly.

PLUGIN_FILE_MUST_END_WITH_TS.message: Plugin file must end with .ts, at file: %s
solutions: Change the file type to .ts.

IS_COPY_FROM_HAS_CIRCLE.message: buildOptionSet config buildOption:%s copyFrom has circle %s in file: %s.
solutions: Ensure that the buildOptionSet is configured correctly.
Please verify the integrity of your SDK.
Please update the SDK at the download link below.

PACK_TGZ_PACKAGE_FILE_NOT_EXIST.message: File is not exist, Failed to pack the tgz package, at file: %s
solutions: Check if the file path is correct.

LITE_WEARABLE_ONLY_SUPPORT_JS.message: Lite wearable only support JS, at file: %s
solutions: Use JavaScript when building the Lite wearable application.

CURRENT_MODULE_NOT_SUPPORT_THE_DEVICE_TY.message: The %s module '%s' that the current module depends on does not support the device type: '%s', which may cause runtime exception on the device.
solutions: Update the module configuration.
Select a compatible module that supports the target device types to prevent potential runtime exceptions.

TRANSFORM_LIB_SHOULD_BE_RELATIVE_PATH.message: Invalid transformLib, its value should be a relative path, at file: %s
solutions: Change the corresponding path to a relative path.

TRANSFORM_LIB_IS_NOT_FILE.message: Invalid transformLib value %s is not file, at file: %s
solutions: Check if the file path is correct.

TRANSFORM_LIB_FILE_NOT_EXIST.message: Invalid transformLib value, %s is not exist, at file: %s
solutions: Check if the file path is correct.

TRANSFORM_LIB_REQUIRES_A_X_FILE.message: Invalid transformLib value, it requires a %s file in %s, at file: %s
solutions: Check whether the corresponding file is included.

SCHEMA_FILE_CANNOT_BE_FOUND.message: The schema file cannot be found, at file: %s
solutions: Check whether the file exists in the SDK.

SUPPORT_CONFIGURE_BUNDLED_DEPENDENCIES.message: Only the byte code har supports to configure the bundledDependencies, at file: %s
solutions: The 'buildOption.strictMode' must have required property 'useNormalizedOHMUrl' and its value must be true in project-level build-profile.json5, and 'buildOption.arkOptions.byteCodeHar' can not be false in module-level build-profile.json5.
Make sure the directory is within the current module directory.

METADATA_RESOURCE_NOT_STRING.message: metadata.resource must be string in file: %s.
solutions: Check whether the metadata.resource in the response file is configured as string.
Check whether the metadata.resource of the response file is configured correctly.
Verify that remote signing is configured correctly.
Fix syntax errors related to the file path.

NOT_CORRECT_JSON_FORMAT.message: Not a correct JSON/JSON5 format, at file: %s
solutions: Confirm whether the file is a valid JSON/JSON5 file.
Please check the integrity of the project and files.

NODE_NOT_FOUND_BY_NODE_NAME.message: node not found by node name: %s.
solutions: Please check whether the build-profile.json5 is configured correctly.

VERSION_IS_NOT_A_STRING.message: Invalid dependency: Version %s is not a string.
solutions: Check whether the configuration of setVersion() in the hvigorfile.ts is correct.

DEPENDENCY_VERSION_IS_NOT_A_STRING.message: Invalid dependency: DependencyVersion %s is not a string.
solutions: Check whether the configuration of the hvigorfile.ts is correct.

CAN_NOT_ADD_OR_DELETE_PRODUCTS.message: Cannot add or delete products, at file: %s
solutions: The number of products in the project-level buildProfile file cannot be changed.

CAN_NOT_CHANGE_NAME_OR_RUNTIME_PRODUCTS.message: Cannot rename or change the runtime OS of products. Expected %s.
solutions: The runtime operating system and name of the product in the project-level buildProfile file cannot be modified
The associated schema has not been initialized. Please sync the project.
Check whether the compatibleSdkVersion of the project-level build-profile.json5 is configured correctly.

STARTUP_CONFIG_FILE_NOT_EXIST.message: Invalid configuration in the '%s' module.json5. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the file %s exists.

STARTUP_SRCENTRY_IS_ABSOLUTE.message: Invalid app startup configuration '%s' in the module '%s': the value of 'srcEntry' or 'configEntry' in startupTasks should be a relative path. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the value of 'srcEntry' or 'configEntry' in startupTasks is a relative path.

STARTUP_SRCENTRY_SUFFIX.message: Invalid app startup configuration '%s' in the module '%s': the suffix of the code file specified by the field 'srcEntry' under 'startupTasks' and 'configEntry' should be ets,ts or js. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the suffix of the code file specified by the field 'srcEntry' under 'startupTasks' or 'configEntry' is ets,ts or js.

STARTUP_SRCENTRY_MODULE_FILE.message: Invalid app startup configuration '%s' in the module '%s': the file of 'srcEntry' or 'configEntry' in startupTasks should be the module file where it is configuration. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the file of 'srcEntry' or 'configEntry' in startupTasks is the module file where it is configuration.

STARTUP_SRCENTRY_FILE_EXIST.message: Invalid app startup configuration '%s' in the module '%s': the code file specified by the field 'srcEntry' or 'configEntry' in startupTasks must exist. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the code file specified by the field 'srcEntry' or 'configEntry' in startupTasks is exist.

APP_PRELOAD_STARTUP_SRCENTRY_SUFFIX.message: Invalid app startup configuration '%s' in the module '%s': the suffix of the code file specified by the field 'srcEntry' in appPreloadHintStartupTasks should be so. At file: %s
solutions: Check whether the suffix of the code file specified by the field 'srcEntry' in appPreloadHintStartupTasks is so.

STARTUP_TASK_NAME_UNIQUE.message: Duplicate name '%s' exists in the %s attribute in the startup configuration file of the '%s' module.
solutions: Check whether the %s attribute in the startup configuration files of the '%s' module and its related modules has the same name as '%s'.

INVALID_PLUGIN_EXPORT.message: At file: %s , it exports an invalid plugin '%s' with invalid order return '%s'. Must return a number value.
solutions: Check the custom plugin exported at file: %s

DUPLICATED_PLUGIN_NAME_IN_ROLLUP.message: '%s' exports an invalid plugin whose name '%s' duplicate with other plugins. Please rename this plugin.
solutions: Rename plugin '%s' called '%s'.
Check if default export exists at file: %s .
Check if it exports an undefined plugin at file: %s .

INVALID_PLUGIN_TYPE.message: '%s' exports an invalid plugin with type '%s'.
solutions: Check if it exports an invalid plugin type at file: %s . The plugin should be an object

PLUGIN_NAME_NOT_EXIST.message: '%s' exports an invalid plugin without a name.
solutions: Check if plugin name exists at file: %s .

PLUGIN_NAME_NOT_STRING.message: '%s' exports an invalid plugin whose name is not a string.
solutions: Check if plugin name is a string at file: %s .

PLUGIN_NAME_WITH_UNKNOWN_ORDER.message: '%s' exports an invalid plugin '%s' with unknown order '%s'.
solutions: Check if plugin '%s' has an correct order at file: %s .

PLUGIN_NAME_WITH_UNKNOWN_HOOK.message: '%s' exports an invalid plugin '%s' whose hook '%s' is not a function.
solutions: Check if plugin '%s' has a hook named '%s' that is not a function at file: %s .

PRODUCT_NAME_NO_FOUND.message: Unable to find the product '%s' for module '%s'. At file: %s
solutions: Verify the product attribute in the build-profile.json5 file.
Value should be one of: 'arm64-v8a', 'armeabi-v7a', 'x86_64'
Value should be one of: 'entry', 'feature', 'har', 'shared'. Check the 'type' field in 'module.json5' or 'config.json'.

INVALID_RUNTIME_OS_VALUE.message: RuntimeOS: %s is an invalid value. Please check it.
solutions: Value should be one of: 'OpenHarmony', 'HarmonyOS'. Check 'runtimeOS' field in 'build-profile.json5'.

PAGE_ABILITY_REQUIRE_JS_COMPONENT.message: A Page ability requires a JS component with the same name at %s.
solutions: Make sure a JS component named %s is contained in the config.json file.

ABILITY_NAME_NOT_EXIST.message: Ability name %s does not exist in config.json.
solutions: Check ability name at %s.

Try to clean and rebuild the project.

SDK_VERSION_TOO_LOW.message: The SDK version configured for the current project is too low.
solutions: Update the DevEco Studio from official website.

FA_MODE_DOES_NOT_SUPPORT_UNIT_TEST.message: FA mode does not support unit test.
solutions: Try unit test in Stage mode.

MULTIPLE_MODULE_NAME.message: The module name %s in build-profile.json5 or hvigorconfig.ts must be same as moduleName in %s. At file: %s

Create an API version %s or later project with ArkTS language to use custom types.

solutions: Please make sure custom type's declaration file exists.

INVALID_TYPES_FILES_EXT.message: The suffix of custom type's declaration file '%s' is not valid. At file: %s

INVALID_DEFAULT_DIMENSION.message: Invalid default dimension settings in these widgets: "%s". At file: %s

INVALID_CUSTOM_SYSCAP.message: The intersection of the system capability sets configured for multiple devices is empty. At file: %s

CUSTOM_SYSCAP_IN_EMPTY_DEVICE_TYPES.message:
The device type defined in the %s of the module '%s' is empty, and the general and custom fields in the %s file are not specified or their values are empty.
 at %s

TARGETS_DO_NOT_MATCH.message: The runtimeOS configuration of the target %s does not match %s. At file: %s

INVALID_PROJECT_PATH.message: Invalid project path. Current path does not match: %s

INVALID_PRODUCT_FOR_TARGET.message: Invalid product for target '%s'. At file: %s

COMPATIBLE_VERSION_TOO_LOW.message: The compatible version of the HAR module '%s' cannot be higher than that of the HAP module.

TYPE_OF_VALUE_IN_CONFIG_IS_NOT_SAME.message: Type of attribute '%s' in config.json/module.json5 of HAP is different from the another HAP while compiling '%s'.

TARGET_ABILITY_NAME_CONFLICT.message: '%s' conflict occurred when merging the config.json files in HAP and HAR packages while compiling '%s'.

MERGE_RULE_CONFLICT.message: Unable to merge Config.json files. The value '%s'%s' conflicts with the value: '%s' of a subtag in the HAR file while compiling '%s'.
